description: TOTVS Protheus is an enterprise resource planning program that allows businesses to streamline processes, organize data, and automate administrative management. IT professionals and system administrators who work with Protheus can modify the program using TOTVS Developer Studio for Visual Studio Code (VS Code).

One way in which users can modify Protheus using Developer Studio for VS Code is by applying patches contained in PTM files. TOTVS creates and releases PTM files to fix issues they've discovered in Protheus's code.
